comment.author: 13935339@N05
comment._content: B-17G serial 44-8005 assigned to the 340th Bomb Squadron, 97th BG. Background B-17s (diamond 'Y') are 99th BG. The nearest B-24 is assigned to the 464th BG, while the distant 'black diamond' Lib is assigned to one of the four groups of the 304th Bomb Wing.
